content.html: This is the maintainer who fixed the vulnerability that's causing millions(++?) of dollars of damage. "I work on Log4j in my spare time" "always dreamed of working on open source full time" "3 sponsors are funding @rgoers's work: Michael, Glenn, Matt" People, what are we doing.
content.value:
This is the maintainer who fixed the vulnerability that's causing millions(++?) of dollars of damage.

"I work on Log4j in my spare time"
"always dreamed of working on open source full time"
"3 sponsors are funding @rgoers's work: Michael, Glenn, Matt"

People, what are we doing.
